question: Neurostimulation of which nucleus is used for treatment of dystonia?
ideal_answer: Neurostimulation of globus pallidus internus is effective for treatment of dystonia. Ventral intermediate thalamic nucleus has also been tested for neurostimulation in dystonia patients.
